directions: Beat milk and sugar together in a bowl with an electric mixer until sugar dissolves. Add cream, cake mix, vanilla extract, and lemon zest; beat until smooth.
Blend 1 cup blueberries in a blender until smooth; beat into cream mixture.
Pour cream mixture and remaining blueberries into an ice cream maker and freeze according to the manufacturer's instructions.
title: Lemon-Blueberry Cake Batter Ice Cream
